name: Pricing Table
description: A flexible pricing table with multiple layout options and customizable features

subtitle.text: Select the perfect plan for your business needs. All plans include our core features with no hidden fees.

footerText.text: All plans include 24/7 customer support and a 30-day money-back guarantee.

items.name: Starter
items.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started
items.features:
Up to 5 users
10GB storage
Basic analytics
Email support
Mobile app access

items.name: Professional
items.description: Ideal for growing businesses with advanced needs
items.features:
Up to 25 users
100GB storage
Advanced analytics
Priority support
API access
Custom integrations

items.name: Enterprise
items.description: For large organizations with custom requirements
items.features:
Unlimited users
1TB storage
Custom analytics
Dedicated support
White-label options
Custom development
